price: 47. Y anuncia a los creyentes que recibirán de Al-lah un inmenso favor.
arabic: وَبَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ فَضۡلٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wabashiri al-mu'minīna bi-anna lahum mina al-lahi faḍlan kabīran
